tool.name: remove
tool.command: rm n_out/*mouse_1.fastq n_out/*mouse_2.fastq n_out/*ambiguous_1.fastq n_out/*ambiguous_2.fastq n_out/*both_1.fastq n_out/*both_2.fastq n_out/*neither_1.fastq n_out/*neither_2.fastq t_out/*mouse_1.fastq t_out/*mouse_2.fastq t_out/*ambiguous_1.fastq t_out/*ambiguous_2.fastq t_out/*both_1.fastq t_out/*both_2.fastq t_out/*neither_1.fastq t_out/*neither_2.fastq *.idx n_out/*_normal.REF_*.bai t_out/*_tumor.REF_*.bai *_variant_fixAdjSNP.temp.vcf *_variant_fixAdjSNP.noIds.vcf sorted_n.bai sorted_t.bai
